name: primal_in_the_mane
text: A comment left by primal_in_the_mane was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SchnappM, Catachresis, Ctrl_Z, cailetshadow)

name: ravindra108
text: Here you go... you put a / at the end of the url by mistake

name: cuddlefish
text: beef wins, hands down.

name: agika
text: There is simply no better way to jump over a log: Roast Beef nailed it.

name: chaesar
text:
I think someone commented about the use of dotted lines in this comic, when Beef eyes up the roosters ding-dong. Well here you are.

corpulent women

name: tommycrashwreck
text: I think the comment in question was only about dashes used to indicate line of sight, which these are not.

name: mira
text: if I'm not mistaken, the flesh will turn opaque

name: epicurus
text: ... and that's how you know you are developing a thing for corpulent women.

name: quantumcasaba
text: God, is that obvious!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Man, love me some smoked salmon.

name: aki
text: And I love me some corpulent women, all corporeal bodies and such.

name: lexsenthur
text: I don't think that means what you think it means.

name: pastrami
text: Anybody want a peanut?

name: connellingus
text: Ray's enthusiasm is great. That illustration of him jumping the log also graces the label of Rad Chilies hot sauce.

name: rapid_roy
text:
I kinda knew what it meant but I looked it up anyway.
The execution in this strip is perfect.

name: hikikomori
text: Beef! You think you are developing a thing for corpulent women! How come?

name: philosophe
text: Salmon FRITTATA???

name: stopeatingmyeyes
text: you know I got no sense of eggs YOU KNOW I GOT NO SENSE OF EGGS

name: varnish
text:
You mean the eggs that I ... BONED?

Wait, no. I think I did that wrong.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
[[clears throat]]

you mean the salmon that i... de BONED

name: dtuba
text:
PACS
(Perfect Avatar Comment Synergy)

name: tttt
text:
the problem inherent with Ray's plan is that in a subjective contest such as this one, there's no way to fairly decide a winner when the only judges are the two participants

Ray's lack of preparation does him in again

name: afronaut
text: MUCH Style

name: epicurus
text: Panel 4 can be repackaged with minor alterations for use in your daily life in pretty much any situation.

name: honesttom
text: Bonus points for doing that with panel 7.

name: relaxing
text: The alt text can be read as an answer to either of Ray's questions.

name: molesticide
text:
here we see why ray is so confused about teodor's practicing of parkour, later on.

because obviously, ray is a free-runner.

name: asobi
text: no one will get this, but you deserve more chubbies for it.

name: thomgreenwood
text: Mad ups to Beef for using the word "corpulent".

name: mercuri0us
text: I love this strip.  So brilliantly absurd.  One of my favourites.

name: heccibiggs
text: Beef has no chance against Ray.

name: heccibiggs
text: What, I don't remember this

name: rowboat
text: Happens to me all the time here. I take drugs.

name: invidious
text: For cause or for cure?

name: hateandwar
text: I wish more people could be like Beef and own up to having a thing for corpulent women. It's like doin' a pillow.

name: relaxing
text: i love giving chubbies to such questions as this.

text: There was no question.

name: relaxing
text: That's true, uh... I don't know why I put it that way.
